channel.title: How to make a ::apply command need help
channel.description:
hey i really need a apply command! it should work the same way as ::suggestion but i tryed copy paste it and change the suggestions with apply but i got so many errors
I really need help ps: im nooby so try make it simple.

come on can’t anybody help!? Any user who helps gets 100% credits!
I have been refreshing every minute to see if someone has posted!!!

item.title: How to make a ::apply command need help
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

It would be quite easy using simple buffered writer techniques, as it will simply write the suggestion the user made to a file for you to read.
